languages.text: "Вы убеждаете в этом меня? Или себя?" {n}Кассия отводит взгляд, но голос ее едва заметно теплеет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вы убеждаете в этом меня? Или себя?" {n}Кассия отводит взгляд, но голос ее едва заметно теплеет.{/n}

languages.text: "Are you trying to convince me of that? Or yourself?" {n}Cassia looks away, but her voice gains the slightest hint of warmth.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вы убеждаете в этом меня? Или себя?" {n}Кассия отводит взгляд, но голос ее едва заметно теплеет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Are you trying to convince me of that? Or yourself?" {n}Cassia looks away, but her voice gains the slightest hint of warmth.{/n}
"Are you trying to convince me of that? Or yourself?" {n}Cassia looks away, but her voice gains the slightest hint of warmth.{/n}
"Are you trying to convince me of that? Or yourself?" {n}Cassia looks away, but her voice gains the slightest hint of warmth.{/n}
"Are you trying to convince me of that? Or yourself?" {n}Cassia looks away, but her voice gains the slightest hint of warmth.{/n}

languages.text: “你是想让我相信你的话吗？还是想说服你自己相信这些话？”{n}卡西娅望着远方，但声音中带上了一丝暖意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to convince me of that? Or yourself?" {n}Cassia looks away, but her voice gains the slightest hint of warmth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你是想让我相信你的话吗？还是想说服你自己相信这些话？”{n}卡西娅望着远方，但声音中带上了一丝暖意。{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下が納得させようとしているのはあたくし？それとも自分自身なのですか？」{n}カシアは目をそらすが、その声はほんのりと温かみを増している。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to convince me of that? Or yourself?" {n}Cassia looks away, but her voice gains the slightest hint of warmth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが納得させようとしているのは私？それとも自分自身ですか？」{n} カシアは目をそらすが、その声はほんのりと温かみを増している。{/n}
「陛下が納得させようとしているのはあたくし？それとも自分自身なのですか？」{n}カシアは目をそらすが、その声はほんのりと温かみを増している。{/n}

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr mich davon überzeugen? Oder Euch selbst?" {n}Cassia wendet den Blick ab, aber in ihre Stimme schleicht sich ein Hauch von Wärme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to convince me of that? Or yourself?" {n}Cassia looks away, but her voice gains the slightest hint of warmth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr mich davon überzeugen? Oder Euch selbst? {n}Cassia wendet den Blick ab, aber in ihre Stimme schleicht sich ein Hauch von Wärme.{/n}

languages.text: « Est-ce moi que vous tentez de convaincre ? Ou vous-même ? » {n}Cassia détourne le regard, mais sa voix s'est très légèrement réchauffée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to convince me of that? Or yourself?" {n}Cassia looks away, but her voice gains the slightest hint of warmth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce moi que vous tentez de convaincre ? Ou vous-même ? » {n}Cassia détourne le regard, mais sa voix s'est très légèrement réchauffée.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Está intentando convencerme de eso o busca convencerse a sí mism{mf|o|a}?». {n}Cassia aparta la mirada, pero en su voz hay un atisbo de calidez.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to convince me of that? Or yourself?" {n}Cassia looks away, but her voice gains the slightest hint of warmth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Está intentando convencerme de eso o busca convencerse a sí mism{mf|o|a}?». {n}Cassia aparta la mirada, pero en su voz hay un atisbo de calidez.{/n}

languages.text: "Bunları beni mi yoksa kendini mi ikna etmek için söylüyorsun?" {n}Cassia uzaklara dalıyor ancak sesinde hafif de olsa bir sıcaklık hissetmeye başlıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to convince me of that? Or yourself?" {n}Cassia looks away, but her voice gains the slightest hint of warmth.{/n}
